eu.bavenir.ogwapi.restapi.security

Class AuthenticationVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.bavenir.ogwapi.restapi.security.AuthenticationVerifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.restlet.security.Verifier

    public class AuthenticationVerifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.restlet.security.Verifier
    Verifier usable in the P2P network. The credentials are verified two ways: 1. The clients logs in for the first time: In such case, the credentials are verified by whether or not the ConnectionDescriptor can be created, i.e. whether it is possible to log into the network with provided credentials. 2. The client is already logged and has a ConnectionDescriptor created: ConnectionDescriptor, after successful login, contains the password that was used to connect to the network as one of its fields. Credentials are then compared when this verifier is called.
    Author:
    sulfo

      • AuthenticationVerifier

        public AuthenticationVerifier(CommunicationManager communicationNode,

        Constructor. It is necessary to provide all parameters. If null is provided in place of any of them, the descriptor will not be able to connect (in the best case scenario, the other being a storm of null pointer exceptions).
